alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 29 at 8:16PM CDT until May 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pharr, Hidalgo, South McAllen, Pharr Fire Station Three, Las Milpas, South Pharr Elementary School, J.c. Kelly Elementary School, Garcia Elementary School, Valley View Junior High School, Valley View Elementary School, Tierra Del Sol Golf Course, Orangewood East, Pharr Police Academy, Fairway Grande, Chateau Heights, P S J A High School, Country Club Terrace, San Juan Middle School, Pharr Elementary School and Mayfield Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
